briefTitle: HX575 Epoetin Alfa Subcutaneously (s.c.) in Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD)
officialTitle: Open Label, Single Arm, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of HX575 Epoetin Alfa in the Treatment of Anemia Associated With Chronic Kidney Disease in Pre-dialysis and Dialysis Patients

interventions.name: HX575 epoetin alfa (Sandoz)
otherNames: Binocrit®, Epoetin alfa HEXAL®, Novicrit®, Abseamed®

summary: The study will assess the immunogenicity, safety, and efficacy of HX575 epoetin alfa administered subcutaneously (s.c.) in patients suffering from anemia due to chronic kidney disease (CKD)
